DataElement.preferredDefinition: The variable used to indicate that data are not available by having the site recording a sponsor-defined value (e.g., Not Collected/Not Evaluated/Not Assessed/Not Available/Not Answered)

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to a subject's healthcare encounter._Pulmonary compliance measured without air flow, such as during an inspiratory pause.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Was the healthcare encounter
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the healthcare encounter data collected?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Indicate if the healthcare encounter data was not collected.

ReferenceDocuments.name: HOSTAT
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM-based dataset, the SDTMIG variable HOSTAT is populated by mapping the value of the CDASH variable HOCSTAT "NOT COLLECTED" to "NOT DONE".

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: A check box used to indicate that data collection was "NOT COLLECTED". It cannot be used to indicate that a healthcare encounter did not occur. This variable may only be populated if HOOCCUR is null.

DataElement.changeDescription: 2021-6-10 ak Released per governance approval. 2/19/20 tmt transferred ownership from NRDS to NCI Standards/BMaeske and restored CSIs. 11-26-19 tmt removed NCI CSI, associated with NRDS CSI and changed Registration Status. 11-25-19 tmt transferred ownership from NCI Standards to NRDS/BMaeske. Created as part of the CDISC mapping task_ghd_08.27.18
